## SelectionState enum

Selection state for a visual mark.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum SelectionState 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Hidden | <code>&quot;hidden&quot;</code> | The mark is hidden entirely. |
|  Hovered | <code>&quot;hovered&quot;</code> | The mark is hovered by the mouse. |
|  NoData | <code>&quot;nodata&quot;</code> | The mark represents a 'no data' value. |
|  Normal | <code>&quot;normal&quot;</code> | Normal representation of a mark. |
|  Selected | <code>&quot;selected&quot;</code> | The mark is in a selected state. |
|  Suppressed | <code>&quot;suppressed&quot;</code> | The mark is suppressed, such as when another mark is being strongly emphasized. |
